body.p:
Cynthiana Ky January 27th 1862
To his Excellency Governor B. Magoffin
Dear Sir

Judge J R Curry being Sick requested me to say to you that Pleasant Lilly a justice of the peace in the Leesburg Precinct No 8 in this county has left the State & vacated his office, and that Charles L. Ford Esq of the Same Precinct This day sent in his resignation having removed from the county. Ford and the citizens recomend William Anderson, and Elijah McDaniel in their stead, to be commissiod by you as justices for said Precinct,

Very Respectfully
your obt Servt.
P. Wherritt Clk H C C
for J R Curry P. J H C C
